thread.title: Selected: Baba Rahman starts first Premier League game for Chelsea
thread.title_full: Selected: Baba Rahman starts first Premier League game for Chelsea

title: Selected: Baba Rahman starts first Premier League game for Chelsea
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 15:56 CET Selected: Baba Rahman starts first Premier League game for Chelsea - www.allsports.com.gh 
Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho has handed Ghana international Abdul Baba Rahman his first English Premier League start since arriving at the club in the summer transfer window. 
The start also marks Baba Rahman's English Premier League debut as the former Kotoko star has only featured in the UEFA Champions League and the English League Cup for the Starmford Bridge outfit. play
